name: En remolinos
description:
Orpheus & Aurelius got trapped in an ancient tower full of mysteries, but whose fault was it? But wait, there's no time for arguing, or is there? You have to fight for your life, but why are you feeling so down? 

Push boxes around and survive as you try to work with your partner to get out before it's too late.

Entry for the 1st May Day Mental Health Jam

Team

  • Luis León — Storytelling & Narrative Design
  • Robin Vallejo — Character Design & Concept Artist
  • Cami Escobar — Game Music & Sound Design
  • José Limón — Game Programmer
  • David Zuratzi — Game Design & Technical Art
